rules.natural: Whenever the pasta contest is held at the park pavilion, it requires setup of tables.
Under the condition that the pasta contest is held at the park pavilion, it requires setup of electricity.
Either the pasta contest is held at the park pavilion or the cooking demo is held at the park pavilion.
Provided that the cooking demo is held at the park pavilion, the cooking demo does not have a conflict with the main stage.
If the pasta contest requires setup of a sound system, then the cooking demo does not have a conflict with the main stage.
Whenever the pasta contest requires setup of tables, it requires setup of a sound system.
If it is not the case that the pasta contest being approved implies the festival is successful, then the cooking demo has a conflict with the main stage.
If it is not the case that the pasta contest requiring electricity setup implies the cooking demo does not have a conflict with the main stage, then electricity has a backup generator.
If it is not the case that electricity having a backup generator implies it has an issue with the generator, then the pasta contest is canceled.

facts.natural: The pasta contest is not canceled.
Electricity does not have an issue with the generator.
